BackstoryDef.title: copyist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: To the dismay of [PAWN_possessive] creative parents, [PAWN_nameDef] never seemed to find [PAWN_possessive] own musical or artistic style. However, what [PAWN_nameDef] did find was [PAWN_possessive] talent for forging the styles of others, with a miniscule margin of error.

BackstoryDef.title: free spirit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alongside satyrs and fauns in a free-spirited pod far away from any human influence. From sunrise to sunset, [PAWN_nameDef] lived [PAWN_possessive] life carefreely, penning wonderful pieces of poetry, playing the lyre and showering under the glistening pour of a waterfall.

BackstoryDef.title: fendersmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained the palace fireplaces for a number of royal families. One of the royals took quite a romantic interest in [PAWN_nameDef], despite their disparity in status, but [PAWN_nameDef] was much more infatuated with the sight, the feeling and the power of a scorching fire than [PAWN_pronoun] could be with any other living creature.

BackstoryDef.title: biomineralogist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was dispatched on a government-funded expedition to the rim to study the relationship between plant life and minerals. [PAWN_possessive] no-nonsense approach to [PAWN_possessive] objective somewhat dampened the morale of [PAWN_possessive] team during transit, but when [PAWN_possessive] shuttle came under fire by spaceborne pirates and [PAWN_nameDef] was the only one to have landed on the rim safely, [PAWN_pronoun] would have given anything to have them back.

BackstoryDef.title: curio collector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] defected from society and was welcomed into a tribe of fauns. The tribe were meek; almost “humanphobic”, and made haste at the mere sound of company passing through their land. Once travellers had passed by, [PAWN_nameDef] would scour the ground for mementos, and eventually amassed a trove of bottle caps, scrunched-up papers and other trash to remind [PAWN_objective] of human presence.
